name: Python
description: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability, versatility, and vast library support.

name: AWS
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a leading cloud platform offering scalable computing, storage, and analytics services.

name: Azure
description: Microsoft Azure is a cloud computing platform for building, managing, and deploying applications through Microsoft-managed data centers.

name: SQL
description: SQL (Structured Query Language) is used to manage and manipulate relational databases efficiently.

name: Spark
description: Apache Spark is a fast, distributed data processing engine for large-scale analytics and machine learning.

name: Airflow
description: Apache Airflow is an open-source workflow orchestration tool for scheduling, monitoring, and automating data pipelines.

name: Snowflake
description: Snowflake is a cloud-based data warehouse solution that supports data storage, processing, and analytics with high performance.

name: Hadoop
description: Apache Hadoop is a framework that allows for distributed storage and processing of large data sets using a cluster of computers.

name: Power BI
description: Power BI is Microsoftâ€™s business analytics tool that provides interactive visualizations and real-time business intelligence dashboards.

name: Grafana
description: Grafana is an open-source platform for monitoring and observability, used to visualize time-series data and metrics.

name: Matplotlib
description: Matplotlib is a Python library for creating static, animated, and interactive visualizations in data analysis.

name: GitHub Actions
description: GitHub Actions automates software workflows such as building, testing, and deployment directly from GitHub repositories.

name: Databricks
description: Databricks is a unified analytics platform that integrates data engineering, machine learning, and collaborative data science.

name: CI/CD
description: CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) automates code integration, testing, and deployment for faster delivery.

name: Problem Solving
description: Problem solving is the ability to analyze, design, and implement logical solutions efficiently to overcome technical challenges.
